title: The Emergence of MIG-Switch: A Flash Cart Controversy Unraveled
description: Amidst the gaming community’s intrigue, the release of MIG-Switch, a flash cart for Nintendo Switch consoles, has sparked a flurry of questions and speculation. With its capability to run downloaded games on any iteration of the console, regardless of hardware or firmware changes, the timing and origins of this device have become a subject of […]

description: VideoPrism, a groundbreaking video encoder by Google AI, addresses the complexities of diverse video content. title: U.S. Department of Energy Agrees To Stop Gathering Information on Crypto Mining Following Lawsuit
description:
The U.S. Department of Energy (DOE) is agreeing to stop gathering data about the energy usage rates of crypto mining firms. In a new court filing, the Energy Information Administration (EIA), which tracks statistics for the DOE, says it will not only halt gathering the data, it will destroy all information it has already collected […]
